mapper.select: /* intrTaskInqy1011 : 업무일지 조회 */ SELECT T.TASK_ID , T.EMP_IDX , T.TASK_TITLE , T.TASK_CONT , T.TASK_DT , E.EMP_NM , O.ORG_NM , R.RANK_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.REG_DT),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.REG_DT),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.REG_TM, 'HH24MISS'), 'HH24:MI') AS REG_TM FROM TASK T LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP_INFO E ON E.EMP_IDX = T.EMP_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN ORG O ON O.ORG_CD = E.ORG_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN RANK R ON R.RANK_CD = E.RANK_CD WHERE 1=1 AND T.EMP_IDX = #{empIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.TASK_DT = CASE WHEN REPLACE(#{srchDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','') IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') ELSE REPLACE(#{srchDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','') END ORDER BY T.TASK_SNO ASC

/* intrTaskInqy2011 : 업무일지 목록 조회 */ SELECT RESULT.* FROM ( SELECT DATA.* , COUNT(DATA.TASK_IDX) OVER(PARTITION BY DATA.TASK_IDX ORDER BY 1) AS ROW_NUM FROM ( SELET T.* FROM TASK T ) DATA WHERE 1=1
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(DATA.EMP_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{srchNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND DATA.REG_DT >= REPLACE(#{srchSdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')
AND DATA.REG_DT <= REPLACE(#{srchEdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(O.ORG_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{orgNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(R.RANK_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{rankNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
) RESULT ORDER BY RESULT.ROW_NUM ASC, RESULT.DISP_ORDER ASC
